title: I GOT LEAVER BUSTER TIMER FOR 5 GAMES 20 MINS FOR LEAVING CHAMPION SELECT ONCE
body: i was in champ select and somehow my client crashed then when i logged back in i got a 20 minute timer for 5 games{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{champion:105}} {{summoner:3}} {{item:3751}}

replies.body:
The [Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) does not grant penalties for a single instance of disconnecting. In fact, it takes a trend of disconnections before you'll see a 5x 20min low-priority queue, because we understand that emergencies happen.

Crashes in champ select are most often caused by your connection dropping from the servers. Problematic local network configurations are the most common cause to this happening, so I would recommend checking with our [network guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are aligned with it.

Let me know if those steps helped.
